item.title: Glasgow Disability Alliance
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan BS - Brian Scott MM Okay now on Iriss.fm, I'm here in the Glasgow Disability Alliance office and I'm speaking to Brian Scott. Now Brian Scott is the Development Manager for the Alliance so thanks Brian... BS - Hi. Male voice - ...for taking the time out to speak to us. So first of all give us a quick over view and a quick insight into what is Glasgow Disability Alliance?
